pkgmetadata.longdescription: unixODBC is an Open Source ODBC sub-system and an ODBC SDK for Linux, Mac OSX, and UNIX. The unixODBC Project goals are to develop and promote unixODBC to be the definitive standard for ODBC on non MS Windows platforms.
